text: (Twaranavuze tuti) “Nimugira neza ni mwe muzaba mwigiriye neza, kandi nimunagira nabi ni mwe muzaba mwihemukiye. Nuko ubwo isezerano rya nyuma rizasohora, (tuzashoboza abanzi banyu) kugira ngo babasuzuguze, baninjire mu Musigiti (w’i Yeruzalemu) nk’uko bawinjiyemo bwa mbere, ndetse bazanasenya ibyo bazajya bahura na byo byose.ˮ
